meanings.definition: The plural form of bregma, the highest point of the skull

meanings.sent2: The bregmata on the skull are like little bumps that doctors use to find the right spot.
meanings.sent3: When the doctor tapped on the bregmata, it made a funny sound like a drum.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers traced the bregmata of the skull, feeling the contours of the head.
meanings.sent5: The bregmata, like tiny hills on the skull, guided the surgeon's hand.
